alert.note: Alert for Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cherry County through 345 PM MDT... At 258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Merriman, or 21 miles east of Gordon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road and Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 120 and 123. Highway 61 between mile markers 204 and 215. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
